ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] kunark level 21
ygData.msgSnippet: Definitely.  My guild has been so successful in the Lake of Ill Omen zone that our entire guild roster from level 17-24 now resides in that zone.  It took me
ygData.messageBody:
Definitely. My guild has been so successful in the Lake of Ill Omen zone
that our entire guild roster from level 17-24 now resides in that zone. It
took me about a week to convince one person to try it, but once they
realized I had made two levels there in a week they knew it must be the land
of milk and honey. I just don't level that fast.

We have a full group pretty much every single night in that zone. The
goblins, sabertooths, and sarnaks make for good xp and good loot. Plenty of
lesser icebones and lesser charbones as well. I was easily able to solo
there as a bard at 24th level. Our 22nd level bard found he could solo just
as well so you should be fine.

Kitasi

Is there anywhere that a lvl 21 can fight on Kunark without being completely
slaughtered? :)
